Nightlight:

"Honestly, I'm not all right" replied Nightlight"I feel dizzy and I'm 
not awake competly... I thinkt tha I should better sit awhile if I 
don't like fall..."

Nightlight tottered towards the bed and sat. "Are Trinity and Zeny 
ok??" she asked "Why do you think that Termitron killed Gramps??"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:

>     He put his hands on Nightlight's shoulders to help her 
balance.  "Are you 
> sure you're all right?"  He turns back to The Hero again.  "So what 
exactly 
> are you the hero of?"
